actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-443.

official_title: A bill to permit the Mountain Park Master Conservancy District in Oklahoma to make a payment to satisfy certain obligations to the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to accept a specified amount as full repayment by the Mountain Park Master Conservancy District of the reimbursable construction costs of the Mountain Park Project in Oklahoma. Requires title to project facilities to remain with the United States.

titles.title: A bill to permit the Mountain Park Master Conservancy District in Oklahoma to make a payment to satisfy certain obligations to the United States, and for other purposes.
